dict.acceptation: 甜的；愉快的，快乐的；温柔的，亲切的；芳香的；
糖果，甜食；餐后的甜点心；甜味；宝贝；

sent.orig: Fruit are all plants, and all are sweet, and all have seeds (barring genetic manipulation)
sent.trans: 水果都是植物，都是sweet,而且都有种子。

sent.orig: The apples are sweet. sweet. sweet. sweet.
sent.trans: 这个苹果是甜的。甜的。甜的。甜的。

sent.orig: Have the sweet sugar onion pancake to heart, sweet-smelling oyster bakes, small and exquisite millet.
sent.trans: 有甜到心头的糖葱薄饼，香喷喷的蚝烙，小巧的小米等。

sent.orig: Sweet sweet lake goes vacationing village and streamers, send festal atmosphere.
sent.trans: 香蜜湖度假村里张灯结彩，一派节日气氛。

sent.orig: The Bitter must come before the sweet; and that also make the sweet the sweeter.
sent.trans: 苦应先于甜，会使甜更甜。
